description: Dak Ramsey has Cayden Banks chained up on his bed. Cayden regrets that while hitchhiking several days ago he got into Dak's car. Cayden begs for his freedom, but must first endure Dak's sadistic hijinks. While bound, Cayden is flogged, caned, wrapped, and waxed. Before Dak lets him go, Dak fucks him hard until he cums.
title: Please Hurt Me, Sir!
